title: Critical ERASE History, STINKIEST STATES 6.10.21
itunes:title: Critical ERASE History, STINKIEST STATES 6.10.21
description:
In episode 927, Jack and Miles are joined by producer and writer Joelle Monique to discuss Texas' 1836 Project, criminals using an encryption app made by the FBI, the media's double standard for Islamophobia and Anti-Semitism, the smelliest states in the United States, more UFO updates, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Texas’ 1836 Project aims to promote “patriotic education,” but critics worry it will gloss over state’s history of racism
  2. The Alamo Should Never Have Happened
  3. The Criminals Thought the Devices Were Secure. But the Seller Was the F.B.I.
  4. Truck Attack That Killed a Muslim Family in Canada Was Planned
  5. New study names the 10 smelliest states in the US
  6. Leaked US Navy video shows UFO flying in California — and suddenly diving underwater
  7. Bright blue UFO seen crashing into ocean near Hawaii prompts calls to 911, FAA
  8. LISTEN: Pink Pantheress - Break It Off (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
